TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Evidence extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class Evidence Implements ICollection
public ref class Evidence sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type Evidence = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 定义组成对安全策略决策的输入的一组信息。

span.span: Defines the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 证据的常见形式包括签名和代码中，源位置，但可能可以是任何内容。Common forms of evidence include signatures and location of origin of code, but can potentially be anything. 识别安全策略的任何类型的对象表示的证据。Objects of any type that are recognized by security policy represent evidence. 安全策略组成的代码组;如果它满足代码组的成员资格条件，特定的程序集 （授予安全权限的基本单位） 是代码的代码组的成员。Security policy is composed of code groups; a particular assembly (the basic unit of code for granting security permissions) is a member of a code group if it satisfies the code group's membership condition. 证据是输入到成员资格条件用于确定程序集所属的代码组的策略集。Evidence is the set of inputs to policy that membership conditions use to determine to which code groups an assembly belongs. 类是一个集合 (请参阅) 包含一组表示证据的对象。The class is a collection (see ) that holds a set of objects that represent evidence. 此类包含对应的两个集的证据的源： 主机证据和程序集证据。This class holds two sets that correspond to the source of the evidence: host evidence and assembly evidence. 评估代码的权限时，策略可以从两个不同的源获取的证据。Policy can get evidence from two different sources when evaluating permissions for code. - `Host evidence` 提供的主机，并只由主机已被授予权限。`Host evidence` is provided by the host, and can only be provided by hosts that have been granted the permission. 通常情况下，这是原点的代码和数字签名的程序集的证据。Typically, this is evidence of the origin of the code and digital signatures on the assembly. 通常包括有关源的证据， ，和证据。Evidence about origin typically includes , , and evidence. 签名是指软件发布者 （AuthentiCode X.509v3 签名） 和强名称标识。Signatures refer to software publisher (AuthentiCode X.509v3 signature) and strong name identities. 这两种类型的数字签名基于标识内置于程序集，但必须进行验证并由主机; 传递到策略加载时，安全系统将验证签名。Both kinds of digital signature-based identity are built into the assembly, but must be validated and passed to policy by the host; when loaded, the security system verifies the signature. 然后，系统创建相应的证据，并将其传递给策略，仅当相应的签名有效。The system then creates the appropriate evidence and passes it to policy only if the corresponding signature is valid. - `Assembly evidence` 是程序集本身的一部分。`Assembly evidence` is part of the assembly itself. 开发人员或管理员可以将自定义证据附加到要扩展的策略的证据集的程序集。Developers or administrators can attach custom evidence to the assembly to extend the set of evidence for policy. 只能在程序集生成之前已签名程序集, 发生时添加的程序集证据。Assembly evidence can only be added at the time of assembly generation, which occurs before the assembly is signed. 安全系统的默认策略会忽略程序集提供证据，但可以扩展策略来接受它。The default policy of the security system ignores assembly-provided evidence, but policy can be extended to accept it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建新具有这两类主机证据和程序集证据。The following code example demonstrates how to create new classes with both host evidence and assembly evidence. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CPP/evidence_evidence.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CS/evidence_evidence.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/VB/evidence_evidence.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的派生自程序集的证据。Use this method for evidence derived from the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不执行检查，以防止添加重复的证据的类型。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 在同一时间可以存在多个程序集证据对象。Many assembly evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同证据的两个实例的哈希代码可能会有所不同，因此，不应使用哈希代码来比较两个对象。The hash code for two instances of the same evidence might be different, Therefore, hash codes should not be used to compare two objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用 GetHashCode 方法。The following code example shows the use of the GetHashCode method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. ```vb Console.WriteLine(ControlChars.Lf & "Get the hashcode for the evidence.") Console.WriteLine(("HashCode = " & myEvidence.GetHashCode().ToString())) ``` ```csharp Console.WriteLine("\nGet the hashcode for the evidence."); Console.WriteLine("HashCode = " + myEvidence.GetHashCode().ToString()); ``` ```cpp Console::WriteLine( "\nGet the hashcode for the evidence." ); Console::WriteLine( "HashCode = {0}", myEvidence->GetHashCode() ); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回派生自的证据类。This method returns only evidence that is derived from the class. 它不会返回从其他类派生的旧证据对象。It does not return legacy evidence objects that are derived from other classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序代码通常不使用此属性。Application code does not normally use this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Merge(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

param.name: evidence
param.span: 要合并到当前证据集的证据集。

span.span: The evidence set to be merged into the current evidence set.

summary.span: 将指定的证据集合并到当前证据集。

span.span: Merges the specified evidence set into the current evidence set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的证据集中每个证据对象添加到当前证据集的程序集和主机集根据它所来自的集。Each evidence object in the specified evidence set is added to the assembly and host sets of the current evidence set, according to the sets from which it came. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不执行检查，以防止添加重复的证据的类型。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 在同一时间可以存在多个程序集和主机证据对象。Many assembly and host evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CPP/evidence_evidence.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CS/evidence_evidence.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/VB/evidence_evidence.vb#10)]
